Package solver.constraints.ternary

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistanceXYZ

    |X-Y| OP Z
    Max
    X = MAX(Y,Z)
    Min
    X = MIN(Y,Z)
    PropDistanceXYZ
    A constraint to state |x0 - x1| operator x2 where operator can be =, <=, >= and x1, x2, x3 are variables Warning: only achieves BoundConsistency for the moment !
    PropDivXYZ
    X/Y = Z A propagator for the constraint Z = X / Y where X, Y and Z are integer, possibly negative, variables The filtering algorithm both supports bounded and enumerated integer variables
    PropMaxBC
    X = MAX(Y,Z)
    ensures bound consistency
    PropMinBC
    X = MIN(Y,Z)
    ensures bound consistency
    PropTimesNaive
    V0 * V1 = V2
    PropTimesXY
    X*Y=Z filters from left to right
    PropTimesZ
    X*Y=Z filters from right to left
    Times
    X*Y = Z
